DOC.detailed_description: Depot medroxyprogesterone acetate ( DMPA ) generic form DepoProveraÂ® shot . When receive birth control shot girl gain lot weight others . Some girl also lose bone mineral density ( BMD ) . Bone mineral density amount weight thickness bone . In study 1 3 dos DMPA give injection muscle arm . The 150mg dose approve use age group Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) give muscle . The 104mg dose approve use age group FDA give skin therefore consider experimental . DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 1221 year 2 . Healthy , postmenarcheal female 3 . Selfselected initiate depot medroxyprogesterone acetate ( DMPA ) 4 . Willingness use barrier method contraception addition DMPA 1 . Chronic disease know affect weight bone mineral density ( BMD ) ( e.g . diabetes , kidney ) 2 . Use medication know affect weight BMD ( e.g . corticosteroid ) 3 . DMPA use within past 12 month 4 . Pregnancy within past 6 month 5 . Etonogestrel implant , levonorgestrelreleasing intrauterine system combine estrogen/progesterone contraceptive use within past 30 day ( OC , patch , vaginal ring ) 6 . Weight exceed 450 lbs 7 . Need confidential contraceptive care individual < 18 year age .
